page.title: 14TRADE:THE VICTORIA INN
page.content: IN THE{SUMMER}AT THE{VICTORIA INN THEY PLAY{BOULE}ON A{SUNDAY}MORNING .MY{FATHER}PLAYS IN THIS{TEAM}AND I AM A{RESERVE. THEY ALSO PLAY{FOOTBALL, DARTS}AND {SKITTLE MATCHES}IN THE{WINTER,}AS WELL AS{CRIBBAGE (CARD GAME).} {THE VICTORIA INN}IS RUN BY{MR. AND {MRS. STONE.}IT HAS A{LARGE BEER GARDEN AND A PLAY AREA FOR CHILDREN.DURING THE{SUMMER}THEY HAVE{BARBECUES}AND OTHER{FAMILY ENTERTAINMENTS . THE{VICTORIA INN}HAS HAD A VERY SUCCSESFUL YEAR{(1985)}WINNING COMPETITIONS.BOTH THE{MENS}AND{LADIES TEAMS WON THEIR{DARTS LEAGUES.}THE {CRIBBAGE}WON THEIR{LEAGUE}AND THE {FOOTBALL TEAM WON TWO TROPHIES.
